title: A question about the devil teemo summ icon
body:
In the RGMQ post it says
"any players who defeat a Doom Bots level will earn the Little Devil Teemo Icon for all eternity"

Beating a doom bot level is in gauntlet mode but on harrowing site it says by beating doom bots only

will i get the icon if i defeat doom bots in the teemoing or do i have to beat them in gauntlet mode to get the icon?

replies.body: Both should be fine!  Keep in mind that it may be a bit to receive the icon, up to two weeks after November 3rd.  Hope that helps!
